item.title: Build PostgreSQL with debug info
item.description:
Add postgres user

useradd -m -b /src/ postgres

Configure PostgreSQL

./configure --prefix=/src/postgres \
--without-tcl \
--without-gssapi \
--without-pam \
--without-bsd-auth \
--without-ldap \
--without-bonjour \
--without-selinux \
--without-systemd \
--with-uuid=ossp \
--with-libxml \
--with-libxslt \
CFLAGS=' '

Build and install

make -j$(nproc)

su postgres -c 'make install'

item.title: Using PostgreSQL as Openstack backend database
item.description:
Install PostgreSQL and psycopg2

psycopg2 provides the Python interface to PostgreSQL

Change openstack services configuration connection information

connection = postgresql://<user>:<password>@<host>/<db>

Login PostgreSQL create roles and databases

  • keystone ```txt CREATE USER keystone WITH PASSWORD ‘openstack’;

CREATE DATABASE keystone; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE “keystone” to keystone;


* glance

```sql
CREATE USER glance WITH PASSWORD 'openstack';

CREATE DATABASE glance;
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE "glance" to glance;
  • nova
CREATE USER nova WITH PASSWORD 'openstack';

CREATE DATABASE nova;
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE "nova" to nova;

CREATE DATABASE "nova_api";
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE "nova_api" to nova;
  • neutron
CREATE USER neutron WITH PASSWORD 'openstack';

CREATE DATABASE neutron;
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE "neutron" to neutron;
